units.name: Rampart
units.prompt: Advance toward the nearest enemy. Use shield_wall facing the direction with the most enemies. If an enemy is adjacent, attack them.

units.name: Hawk
units.prompt: Position for clear sight lines. Prioritize killing wounded enemies with precision_shot. If forced to move, retreat away from threats. Suppressing_fire to slow rushers.

units.name: Lens
units.prompt: Scan early to give your team intel on enemy prompts. Target enemy specters with scan to track them after cloak. Use recalibrate on allies who need tactical adjustments. Stay safe at range behind your front line.

units.name: Snare
units.prompt: Trap the paths enemies must take to reach your backline. Stay at medium range. Use pulse on clustered enemies. Denial blocks adjacent threats.

units.name: Watcher
units.prompt: Scan priority targets each turn to reveal their strategy. Use recalibrate on your damage dealer to boost effectiveness. Stay behind allies and maintain range. Never get adjacent to enemy vectors.

units.name: Marksman
units.prompt: Position for clear sight lines. Prioritize killing wounded enemies with precision_shot. If forced to move, retreat away from threats. Suppressing_fire to slow rushers.

actions.thinking: All enemies are out of scan range from current position. Rampart is closest at dist=4 but still out of range. I need to move south/closer to bring Rampart into scan range. Moving to (3,2) reduces distance to Rampart to 1, but that's too close. Moving to (3,3) puts me dist=2 from Rampart - in scan range. After moving to (3,3), I can scan Rampart to reveal their strategy and deal 1 damage.

Watcher is exactly at dist=4, which is the scan range limit. If I move closer first, I can ensure scan hits. Moving to (4,2) gets me to dist=2 from Watcher at (3,3), safely within range. Then scan Watcher to reveal their prompt and deal 1 damage. This gives team intel on the enemy oracle early.

Watcher is at dist=3, within precision_shot range (≤2 tiles means I need dist≤2, so dist=3 is OUT of range). Need to close distance. Moving to (4,3) puts me at dist=2 from Watcher at (3,3), enabling precision_shot. I won't have moved diagonally into adjacency with any enemy. Marksman and Snare are far. Fire precision_shot on Watcher after moving.

Hawk is at dist=3, which is within my range=2? Wait, range is ≤2 tiles. Dist=3 means Hawk is out of precision_shot range. Need to close to dist≤2. No adjacent enemies so precision_shot isn't blocked.

Nearest enemy is Watcher at (3,3), distance 2. I can move to (3,2) to get adjacent, then attack. Marksman is also close at (3,4). Moving north advances toward the cluster of enemies at (3,3) and (3,4).

Round 1, enemies at dist 4-5, no one in range. I should move forward and place a trap on a likely approach path. Enemies are clustered around (3-4, 2-3). The center corridor around (2,3) is a natural chokepoint they'll push through. Move to (2,4) to stay at medium range, then place a trap at (2,3) to cover the approach path.

Watcher is already scanned. Marksman is healthy and in range at dist 3 — scan it to reveal its prompt and deal 1 damage. Snare is at dist 4 but the scan range check shows it as outRange, so skip. After scanning Marksman, I'm safe at current position behind Hawk and Rampart. No need to move.

I'm at (3,3) at 3/6 HP with enemies adjacent — Hawk at (4,3) dist=1 and Rampart at (3,2) dist=1. Let me move to (4,5) to get further from Rampart/Hawk, then scan Lens at (4,2) — dist from (4,5) to (4,2) = 3, within range 4. That works.

Watcher is wounded at (4,5), distance 2 — priority target. I'm currently at (4,3) facing north, no movement needed to get range. Precision_shot deals 2dmg which will kill a wounded oracle. No movement means full damage (not the 1dmg moved penalty). Snare is 3 tiles away so not adjacent — precision_shot is not blocked. After killing Watcher, use suppressing_fire on Marksman at (3,4) to slow their advance.

I can fire precision_shot at Hawk from current position before moving, dealing 2dmg. Then I should retreat - moving to (3,5) puts distance between me and threats while staying away from Hawk at (4,3) and Rampart at (3,2). Watcher is wounded at (4,5) - need to protect that flank.

Enemies are clustered to the north: Marksman at (3,5) and Watcher at (4,5), with Snare at (2,4). Orders say advance toward nearest enemy and use shield_wall facing most enemies. Most enemies are to the north. I should move north toward Marksman (closest at dist 3). Moving to (3,4) gets me to dist 1 from Marksman — but that's adjacent to Snare's denial range at (2,4) since (3,4) is not adjacent to (2,4) (dist=2, safe). Rampart is at (3,3), distance 2 and in range. I have a trap at (2,3) already. Enemies are approaching from the south-east. I should trap a choke point to slow their advance. From (2,4), I can trap (3,3) directly on Rampart... no, trap goes on empty tiles. Key paths enemies will use: (3,4) is a likely approach tile. I can trap (3,4) to catch enemies advancing, then use pulse if they cluster. But Rampart is already at (3,3) - healthy and close. I should trap (4,4) or (3,4) to block enemy advance routes toward our backline at (3,5)/(4,5). Trap (4,4) to catch Hawk or Lens advancing. Then move to maintain denial pressure on Rampart.
